name: Athletes Global
overview:
Athletes Global website was launched September, 2008. Our mission is to create a platform for Athletes, Fans, Teams, Schools, Coaches, Agents, College Recruiters, Entrepreneurs, and Businesses, to Connect, be Recruited, and Network on a global scale.

Athletes Global has created an innovative and authentic website that allows athletes to connect with other athletes and share pictures, videos, and stats. There able to create personal profiles, post photos and video highlights of their athletic achievements, communicate with professional athletes and connect with millions of other athletes all over the world. We have incorporated an acronym for the word athlete that we believe defines everyone and not just someone thatâ€™s athletic.

Here is the acronym that we believe A.T.H.L.E.T.E.S. stands for: I am Tenacious! I am Accountable! I have Heart! I am a Leader! I am Efficient! I will be Triumphant! I will be an Athlete in Everything! I will be Successful!

Come sign up! www.AthletesGlobal.com
